mean_cn: vi.发光；  n.喜悦，满足的心情
mean_en: (especially of something hot or warm) to produce a dull, steady light; (of a person’s body or face) to look or feel warm or pink, especially after exercise or because of excitement, embarrassment, etc.; to appear a strong, warm colour
sentence: The burning coals glow in the dark.
sentence_trans: 燃烧的煤炭在黑暗中发出光亮。
